lexUnit.name: evacuate.v
lexUnit.definition: COD: remove from a place of danger to a safer place

sentence.text: She added : ` Police had just a few minutes to evacuate thousands of people . "
A van , loaded with explosives , blew up outside the Northern Bank in the busy High Street area as police were trying to evacuate hundreds of shoppers .
